definition: to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱
(of a check etc) to cash/to honor a commitment
remittance/funds paid to a bank account
to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)
to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
to arrange (colloquial)/to transfer creditor's rights (in a debt case)
to cash/to change gold or silver into money

sentences.english: That is in turn buttressing the euro against the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 這也支撐了歐元兌美元走高。

sentences.english: The rate for traveler's cheques is 300 yuan against 100 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 旅行支票的兌換率是100美圓兌300元。

sentences.english: You like the taste of Green Tea and Chivas .
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡綠茶兌芝華士的味道。

sentences.english: The Indian rupee has appreciated about 4 percent against the dollar so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年以來印度盧比兌美元已升值了約4%。

sentences.english: Sterling hit 31-year lows against the U. S. dollar this week.
sentences.chinese: 英鎊兌美元本週觸及31年低點。

sentences.english: He pays close attention to the floating exchange rate of the NTD.
sentences.chinese: 他在密切關注新臺幣兌美元的浮動匯率。

sentences.english: Could you lend me 2000 Yuan now?
We hereby added out confirmation to this credit.
sentences.chinese: 我行因此給該信用證加具保兌。

sentences.english: Can you change this hundred-yuan note?
sentences.chinese: 你能兌這張百元紙幣嗎？

sentences.english: Please note that we have added our confirmation to the above L/C, negotiation is restricted to ourselves only.
sentences.chinese: 上述信用證已經由我行加具保兌，並限向我行交單。

sentences.english: The pound fell to a 23-year low against the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 英鎊兌美元匯率跌至23年低點。

sentences.english: EUR/USD has been holding on its sufficient resistance to block euro from flying away.
sentences.chinese: 歐元兌美元在高保位持着絕對優勢的阻力。

sentences.english: 'Send round for it tomorrow morning, it's too late to get change now. '
sentences.chinese: 明天上午叫人來取吧，現在去兌錢時間太晚了。

sentences.english: It's strange that many people like to drink dry wine mixed with Sprite.
sentences.chinese: 希奇的是，很多人喜歡在幹葡萄酒裏兌上雪碧來喝。

definition: to diminish/to demote/to reduce or devaluate/to disparage/to censure/to depreciate
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
